data.title: Justin Timberlake Adds Nine U.S. Dates To 'The Forget Tomorrow World Tour’
data.meta_description: With Live Nation citing “overwhelming demand” and 1 million tickets already sold, nine U.S. dates have been added to Justin Timberlake’s 2024 world tour.
data.text:

*New shows listed in bold
